comments.body: So, anyone that adds `doc['attributes']` also needs to add this fragment?

Or just create their own, this fragment shows the 'standard ones' that the core engine acknowledges

Another option is to autoadd this fragment to all actions.

I like adding it by default so people don't shoot themselves in the foot with the standard attributes.

I also like that people can add their own fragment with extra attributes. Maybe that will be useful for some collections.

I'm 50/50 on that since I also wanted this to be 'meaningful' for core/engine and allow controller to make decisions based on the docs w/o having to execute the module.

Still WIP, see irc core meeting log, this PR is mostly 'pasta on wall' and will take a while before its ready to merge for next ansible version.
